name: Shadow Weaver
speciality: Manipulates shadows to create illusions and confuse foes.

name: Frostbite Fury
speciality: Inflicts chilling damage, slowing enemies with each strike.

name: Blight Brute
speciality: Spreads toxic spores that weaken and poison nearby creatures.

name: Ember Wraith
speciality: Leaves a trail of fire, igniting anything that crosses its path.

name: Thunderous Roar
speciality: Emits a deafening roar that stuns and disorients enemies.

name: Spectral Stalker
speciality: Phases through walls and becomes invisible for short bursts.

name: Venomous Serpent
speciality: Delivers paralyzing venom with its bite, incapacitating its prey.

name: Earthshatter Titan
speciality: Causes tremors with every step, knocking enemies off balance.

name: Soul Drain Phantom
speciality: Absorbs life energy from foes, healing itself with their pain.

name: Celestial Guardian
speciality: Summons protective light to shield allies and repel darkness.
